title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.39 - License fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.39 - License fee

State Regulations

As a condition of licensure, a platform provider shall
pay to the commission the one-time fee set forth in Racing, Pari-Mutuel

Wagering and Breeding Law 1367-a(3). Such fee shall be paid no later than 30
days after the commission selects such platform provider for potential
licensure, as set forth in Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
1367-a(3). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5330.39

Adopted

New

York State Register November 24, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
